star/heavenly body/satellite/small amount
to run fast/to speed/to gallop/to disseminate/to spread
Stephen Chow (1962-), Hong Kong actor, comedian, screenwriter and film director, known for his mo lei tau 無厘頭|无厘头[wu2 li2 tou2] movies

sentences.english: Rumours of a love affair between Karen Mok Man-wai and Stephen Chiau Sing-chi have been circulating for some time.
sentences.chinese: 莫文蔚和周星馳間的緋聞已流傳了好一段時間。

sentences.english: Renowned artiste Mr Stephen CHOW visits the Exhibition Hall.
sentences.chinese: 影視紅星周星馳先生參觀展覽廳。

sentences.english: Chow’s style at the time of All for the Winner was called “Makes No Sense (wulitou)”.
sentences.chinese: 周星馳在《賭聖》中的風格被稱爲“無厘頭”。

sentences.english: He was born in Hong Kong in June 1962.
sentences.chinese: 周星馳於1962年在香港出生。

sentences.english: The film will be Chow's directorial and acting debut in Hollywood.
sentences.chinese: 這將是周星馳在好萊塢執導並出演的處女作。

sentences.english: Chow has also shown an interest in aspects of film production.
sentences.chinese: 而周星馳對電影製作各方面都非常感興趣。

sentences.english: The film features Gong Li and Zhou Xingchi.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影由鞏利和周星馳主演。
